      • center

        public static java.lang.String center​(double n,
                                      int columnSize,
                                      int numDecimals,
                                      boolean money)
        Method to center a double in a column of size specified by the user and number of decimal places specified by the user.
        Parameters:
        n - a double to be centered in a column
        columnSize - an int representing the size of the column
        numDecimals - int containing the number of required decimal places in the real number.
        money - boolean if true places a $ at the in the value and if false no $.
        Returns:
        a String representing the double centered in the column
